# savonliquide

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->


`savonliquide` allows you to generate a report from the [Contrast Checker API](https://webaim.org/resources/contrastchecker/). The report will display a contrast ratio (that should be above a threshold among) other useful information that will judge the accessibility level of your colors contrast.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `savonliquide` from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:


```{r, eval=FALSE}

remotes::install_github("feddelegrand7/savonliquide")

```
